title: Delay of almost 2h between snapshot download & indexing
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: erigon version 2.49.0-dev-8983128d

OS & Version: Linux

Commit hash: [8983128d](https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/commit/8983128d24c67deb409bd7faa926651e8f55fe68)

Erigon Command (with flags/config): `erigon --datadir /mnt/disks/nvme/mainnet --http.api=admin,debug,eth,net,txpool,trace`

Concensus Layer: lighthouse

Chain/Network: mainnet

#### Expected behaviour

No delay 

#### Actual behaviour

Delay of almost 2 hours:
```
[INFO] [09-04|09:10:58.575] [1/12 Snapshots] download                progress="99.91% 375.8GB/376.1GB" download-time-left=0hrs:0m total-download-time=35m0s download=12.0MB/s upload=0B/s

[INFO] [09-04|09:11:18.575] [1/12 Snapshots] download                peers=10 connections=10 files=27 alloc=147.3MB sys=452.2MB
```
